products.title: Kanza Softshade Blackout Haze Grey Day And Night Blind
products.description: The kanza blackout softshade haze grey is a window covering with a difference. This smart design enables complete blackout when closed, or a practical alternative that is achieved with voile strips between the panels of grey blackout fabric, so you can enjoy a sense of privacy as well as a light and bright interior. products.title: Hoxton Softshade Zinc Grey Day And Night Blind
products.description: Maintain a light and airy feel in your home with the hoxton softshade zinc grey day and night roller blind. Boasting an innovative design of alternating solid fabric and voile strip panels you can enjoy more versatility with your window covering. This design allows for privacy with plenty of natural light, or you can close the blind completely for more shade. The stony grey hue is ideal for blending with cool modern schemes.

products.title: Hoxton Softshade Silver Grey Day And Night Blind
products.description: Make a stylish and practical interior update with the hoxton softshade silver grey day and night roller blind. The design of alternating grey fabric and voile strip panels creates visual impact that will look really smart within a contemporary interior, whilst at the same time this day and night roller blind provides privacy with plenty of natural light so you can maintain a light and bright ambience.

products.title: Kanza Softshade Blackout Neutral Day And Night Blind
products.description: Natural light control is made so simple with the kanza blackout softshade haze neutral day and night roller blind. Created with alternating strips of voile and neutral toned blackout fabric, this stylish window covering provides great flexibility and keeps a light and airy ambience in your interior with the benefit of seclusion and privacy. Additionally you can enjoy complete blackout mode to aid peace and relaxation at night.

The design of alternating solid fabric and voile strip panels enables you to increase privacy without completely shutting out natural light. This practical window blind uses a stylish and functional design that offers various levels of shading to suit your requirements for your space whatever time of day. The fabric and voile alternating panels allow for a touch of shade in your room and enhanced privacy without shutting out the light completely. products.title: Luxa, Cameo - Vista Blind
products.description: Luxa cameo celebrates the beauty and simplicity that arises when crisp and clean lines are used to create a uniquely modern aesthetic. A brilliant white fabric is the backdrop your eye sees through the delicate voile panelling that hangs so effortlessly in front of it. Adding cameo to the kitchen or dinning room will allow you to introduce some modern form and functionality that will perfectly accentuate your existing decor.

products.title: Luxa, Cream - Vista Blind
products.description: Natura cream breathes life into any modern decorated home by celebrating the interplay between fabric and light. A finely crafted voile is applied with care to a gently shaded cream fabric which is soft to the touch. With different shades flowing effortlessly into one another cream allows you to see something different every time you look at it. Give your living room a modern take on the country style of decor by pairing natura cream with stone grey items such as a rug in front of the fire or a selection of scatter cushions on the sofa.

products.title: Luxa, White - Vista Blind
products.description: Every square inch of luxa white shimmers in the sunlight as it serves as the perfect transition between light and shade. With a finely woven fabric accompanied by a delicate voile to offer you complete control of ambience and light, luxa white allows you to create the perfect environment to suit your mood. Crisp and clean, the modern lines of luxa white make it ideal for the modern fitted bathroom where you can add an understated feature that won't confront your existing decor.

products.title: Bayham, Parchment - Vista Blind
products.description: Elegance and sophistication go hand in hand when you caste your eye over the bayham range. Parchment compliments the free flowing nature of the voile panels with gently placed strips of soft white fabric that is as finely woven as it is calm and refreshing. Parchment allows you to make a feature of your window spaces again as you celebrate the beauty of the simple things in life. Keeping your decor crisp and calm with large white scatter cushions and a light grey rug will give your living room the relaxing look and feel that you have always wanted.

products.title: Bayham, Teal - Vista Blind
products.description: Give your home something to smile about with the uplifting tone of bayham teal. The vitality and vibrancy of this unique shade allows you to imbue any room in the house with energy. Combine that with the unique vista style that allows you to add a depth and control to your window hanging like never before and you have a recipe for the perfect contemporary addition to your home. Teal is a great way of adding an energetic presence in the bathroom as you take a soak at the end of a long day.

products.title: Bayham, Port - Vista Blind
products.description: Add style and sophistication to any window space with the elegant and striking presence of bayham port. Stripes of rich homely colour sit between a pair of lightweight and breezy voile panels to give you complete control of light and shade in any room in the home. Port brings a homely quality that will make the living room feel warm and cosy in the winter, whilst the lightweight voile will keep you cool in the summer.

products.title: Bayham, Coffee - Vista Blind
products.description: The bayham range is all about allowing you that bespoke touch that adds comfort and functionality to any home. By combining the gently flowing voile panels with a homely deep brown we call coffee we have created something a little special that will allow you to add modern style and effortless functionality to your home. Coffee is a natural colour that acts as the perfect canvas to bring other finishes and tones into your room.

products.title: Bayham, Red - Vista Blind
products.description: Add a modern touch to your home with the striking and elegant bayham red. With the light dancing its way through the delicately woven voile panels you will be able to create the perfect ambience to suit the occasion by titling the flowing red fabric any way you please. Perfect for bringing a contemporary style into any room in the house. Use red in rooms where you want to bring something a little different to the table.

products.title: Bayham, Butter - Vista Blind
products.description: Bayham butter brings a warm and inviting presence to your home by combining the rich colour of butter with the finely woven fabric of the voile panels that hold it in place. Elegantly suspended and lightweight so it moves with grace when you adjust the light to suit your mood, you'll never think the same way about how light interacts with your decor again. Butter looks amazing when you put it in touch with a range of warm yet slightly washed out colours so that you can add energy and warmth to your room without overpowering your senses.

products.title: Bayham, Primrose - Vista Blind
products.description: Elegant and functional: two words that come to mind when you caste your eye over everything the bayham range has to offer. The warm glow of primrose gently shines through the crisp and clean voile as it hangs effortlessly in your home. Ready for whenever you want to adjust the light levels with ease. Primrose works wonders when you add it to the bedroom in conjunction with gentle blues and greens.

products.title: Bayham, Lime - Vista Blind
products.description: Lime brings your decor to life with the vitality and energy that you can only get from natural colours. Add to that the gently flowing voile panelling and you have a modern piece that will allow you to add style and substance to any room in the house. Look closer and your eye will come to fully appreciate the craftsmanship behind the interplay between the voile and the lime fabric. For a room that allows you to feel full of energy and ready to embrace the day add bayham lime to the kitchen and introduce a few electric blue accessories to your worktops.

products.title: Natura, Gold - Vista Blind
products.description: When you combine modern design with the timeless elegance of natural patterning you can create something special. Natura gold introduces a finely detailed fabric that speaks to the effortless way shade and tone interplay in wood. Perfect for the uplifting touch you have been looking for. It also serves as the ideal companion for the elegant and breezy nature of the voile which hangs exactly how you want it.

products.title: Bayham, Pewter - Vista Blind
products.description: Bayham pewter combines a modern colour with the latest in elegant contemporary design. The gentle hanging voile panels serve as the perfect lens through which to view the deep tone of pewter as you control the ambience in your home with ease like never before. Pewter lends an authentically natural colour to the modern home and allows you to create a theme around stone and wood finishes. Slate floors or small touches like table mats and coasters really come together in the dining room.

products.title: Natura, Bronze - Vista Blind
products.description: A rich and finely crafted fabric, nothing compares to the warm homely feel of natura bronze. By combining a unique fabric that speaks to the grains and tones in dark stained hardwoods with an elegant voile we have created something a little special just for you. Setting the mood of your room has never looked or felt so good. With the unique celebration of woodgrain that bronze brings to your decor it is easy to pair it with any of your favourite pieces of wooden furniture.

products.title: Bayham, Taupe Grey - Vista Blind
products.description: Bayham taupe grey allows you to add a unique modern touch to your home whilst combining it with a timeless colour that brings a classically calming presence to your decor. The lightweight voile hangs effortlessly as you adjust the angle of the finely woven fabric to give the perfect light level for any occasion. We love the look of taupe grey in the kitchen or a cosy cottage style living room. Woods, slate, the fireplace, no matter what authentic style you decide to pair it with you are guaranteed to create a harmony with the existing decor whilst adding the modern touch of their unique vista style.

products.title: Bayham, Navy - Vista Blind
products.description: Navy blue is a classic colour that has finally received the modern twist it deserves with the arrival of bayham navy. By combining elegant voile panels with the regal nature of navy we have created a unique aesthetic that is the perfect blend of style and substance. With the minimum of effort you can now tailor your light levels and the style of your blind in seconds. Navy works wonders when you allow it to create a theme in the master bedroom.

products.title: Bayham, Pure White - Vista Blind
products.description: To allow the light that enters your room to take centre stage your blind should be crisp and clean. Modern lines give bayham pure white the contemporary look that allows it to hang with effortless grace in your home as it offers complete control of the ambient light levels. The finely crafted voile panels serve as the perfect accompaniment for the clean glow of pure white. Keeping your decor simple yet styled is the secret to creating a contemporary home that will stay current for years to come.

products.title: Bayham, Zest - Vista Blind
products.description: Give your home a touch of the true zest for life with the uplifting colour of bayham zest. The perfect backdrop to the delicate voile panelling, every square inch of zest is bursting with colour and energy that will allow your house to feel like a home no matter what time of year it is. Use in rooms where you want to feel the vibrancy of light even when you close your blind for the night. Simple touches like fresh cut flowers on the side and a few landscapes on the walls featuring bright blue cloudless skies will give your room the summery feel all year round.

products.title: Natura, Cream - Vista Blind
products.description: Natura cream breathes life into any modern decorated home by celebrating the interplay between fabric and light. A finely crafted voile is applied with care to a gently shaded cream fabric which is soft to the touch. With different shades flowing effortlessly into one another cream allows you to see something different every time you look at it. Give your living room a modern take on the country style of decor by pairing natura cream with stone grey items such as a rug in front of the fire or a selection of scatter cushions on the sofa.

products.title: Natura, Mist - Vista Blind
products.description: Natura mist combines a lightweight and elegant voile and a richly detailed fabric that immerses your senses to create a modern addition that adds to any home. With a level of craftsmanship and care that is unrivalled, the mist fabric is integrated with the voile panels so that you have complete control of the light in your home. A unique blend of the aesthetic and functional worlds. Mist captures the imagination by taking your eye on a journey through a whole spectrum of colours and tones.

products.title: Bayham, Astra - Vista Blind
products.description: Bayham astra brings a subtle touch to your decor by combining functionality with a homely calming colour that instantly makes you feel at peace. The elegantly hanging voile supports gentle strips of colour that you can manipulate with ease to make sure you have the perfect ambience for the occasion. Cream leather seating and off-white walls allow you to add calming colours that will allow your living room to be the restful place the whole family enjoy spending time in at the end of the day.
